Package org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.multiobjective.agemoea.util

Class AGEMOEAEnvironmentalSelection<S extends Solution<?>>

java.lang.Object
org.uma.jmetal.algorithm.multiobjective.agemoea.util.AGEMOEAEnvironmentalSelection<S>
Direct Known Subclasses:
AGEMOEA2EnvironmentalSelection
public class AGEMOEAEnvironmentalSelection<S extends Solution<?>>
extends java.lang.Object
Environmental Selection used in AGE-MOEA (Adaptive GEometry-based Many-Objective Evolutionary Algorithm)
Author:
Annibale Panichella

    • assignConvergenceScore

      protected void assignConvergenceScore​(java.util.List<S> front)

      public double point2LineDistance​(double[] P, double[] A, double[] B)
      This method compute the point to line distance
      Parameters:
      P - point to consider
      A - First point delimiting the line (direction)
      B - Second point delimiting the line (direction)
      Returns:
      the perpendicular distance between P and the line AB
